org.apache.hive.service

Class CookieSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.service.CookieSigner

  • public class CookieSigner
extends Object
    The cookie signer generates a signature based on SHA digest and appends it to the cookie value generated at the server side. It uses SHA digest algorithm to sign and verify signatures.

        public String verifyAndExtract(String signedStr)
        Verify a signed string and extracts the original string.

        Returns:
        Raw Value of the string without the signature
